register.email_description: This email is used as a reference only. It cannot be modified. We suggest you use a generic email. Example: info@entreprise.com
register.aggrement_text: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book
register.aggrement_label: I acknowledge that I have read and understood the politic of confidentiality
register.region_note: If you have offices in multiple regions, register your main office and add the other locations from your dashboard
register.email_note: Please use a generic email address like info@exemple.com
register.email_contact_note: Please use a professional email like yourname@example.com. Emails will be sent to this address
register.know_about_us: How did you know about us?
register.countofemployee_note: Count of employees and students for all regions
register.firstname_note: Name of the person in charge
register.usercreated: User created - now login to your account
register.prefered_motor_transport_mode_note: Since there is no way to detect specific transport mode like bus or metro, every motorized movement will be categorized as Car. If you want to change default value(car), you can choose which one you want here
register.data_collection_method_note: Type of device you will use to collect movement data during the challenge
register.aggrement_p1: The purpose of these terms of use is to inform the participants of the Défi sans auto solo about the nature of the personal information that will be communicated, their purposes and uses.
register.aggrement_strong2: Collecting data regarding registering for the Défi sans auto solo
register.aggrement_p2: We only collect personal information that is necessary to establish, manage and maintain our relationship in order to provide the best possible service.
register.aggrement_p3: When you register, we may collect the following personal information:
register.aggrement_ul1li1: First Name, Last Name and language of correspondence;
register.aggrement_ul1li5: The name of the organization that employs you;
register.aggrement_ul1li6: The data collection method you will use for the Défi sans auto solo.
register.aggrement_strong3: Collecting data for the Défi sans auto solo
register.aggrement_p4: Following your registration and participation, we may collect the following personal information:
register.aggrement_strong4: Purposes of the use of personal information
register.aggrement_p5: We may use your personal information for the following purposes:
register.aggrement_ul3li1: For the use of the application, including specific purposes;
register.aggrement_ul3li2: Compilation of results in terms of kilometers traveled, GHGs saved and modes of transport used;
register.aggrement_ul3li3: The answer to your emails and requests for technical support;
register.aggrement_ul3li5: Management, planning and improvement of the Défi sans auto solo;
register.aggrement_ul3li7: Invite users to participate in surveys in order to improve our services;
register.aggrement_p6: Your personal information will not be used for purposes other than those listed above, unless you have your consent or as required or permitted by law.
register.aggrement_strong5: Who can access your personal information
register.aggrement_p7: The categories of persons who may, in the performance of their duties, have access to your personal information are the event coordinators within the organization that employs you and the employees of the Centres de gestion des déplacements du Québec. The details of your movements (itineraries and GPS positioning) will not be accessible or disclosed.
register.aggrement_p8: We recognize that, except in the cases and subject to the conditions described below, the disclosure of your personal information to a third party requires your consent. We may, however, without your consent, disclose your personal information when permitted or required by law.
register.aggrement_p9: Whenever we need to disclose your personal information, we will make every effort not to disclose more information than is required in the circumstances.

kbs.title: Greenplay help
kbs.subhead: If you cannot find the answer to your questions, please write to us via the chat module or by email at info@greenplay.social

faqs.title: FAQ
faqs.subhead: Welcome to the FAQ section, if you have questions that are not in the list below, please write to us at info@greenplay.social
faqs.code: What is the organization code and how do I know what my organization code is?
faqs.code_ans: The organization code is a unique code that is automatically generated when an organization account is created. You need to share this code with your employees so that they can join your organization from the Défi sans auto solo mobile app. This code was emailed to you when you completed registration. It can also be found under the 'account' tab of this platform.
faqs.frequency_ans: The data is updated approximately every 4 hours.
faqs.howcollect: How is the dashboard data collected?
faqs.howcollect_ans:
The dashboard data compiles sustainable trips made by participants with a Greenplay account. A sustainable trip is a trip where a mode of transportation other than solo driving is used. To be compiled, a trip must have a minimum distance of 500 meters and 2 minutes. 

You will therefore see all the kilometers traveled and GHGs saved by the employees affiliated with your organization.
faqs.consultdataemployee: Can I consult the data by employee?
faqs.consultdataemployee_ans: Yes, you can export the data using the 'Export to Excel' option located near the list of users on the dashboard. When exporting, you will have access to the following information: name, email, km travelled
faqs.filterbranch: What is the branch tab and filter?
faqs.filterbranch_ans: If your organization has several branches, you can add the name of the different branches and the region in which they are located. Employees will then be able to join their respective branch from their profile within the mobile app. The button at the top of the dashboard allows you to filter the statistics according to the different branches. You will then be able to highlight a specific team's efforts and create a friendly competition between branches
faqs.howtoparticipate: How do I record my own trips as a coordinator for my organization?
faqs.howtoparticipate_ans: To participate and earn points, you must download the mobile app and create a new 'participant' account. It is not possible to register your trips with your 'organization' account.
faqs.emailsame: Can I use the same email for my participant account as my organization account?
faqs.emailsame_ans: No. The email used for the account must be different from the one used for your participant account. However, you can use the same email for your partipant account and for the organization's contact email.
faqs.ghg: How is the GHG calculation done?
faqs.knowmore: How can I learn more about the Défi sans auto solo? Do you have any questions about the Défi sans auto solo?
faqs.knowmore_ans: Do you have questions about the Défi sans auto solo? Visit tab
faqs.knowmore_ans4: or contact the DSA team by email at desisansauto@acgdq.com
faqs.aprelatedquestion: Questions related to the platform and your organization account
faqs.challengerelatedquestion: Questions related to the Défi sans auto solo

settings.maximum_challenge_per_details: Maximum challenge an user can participate per period of time. Changing the rule will immediately overwrite the previous one.
settings.maximum_km_per_details: Maximum km an user can do per trip to earn Greenpoints. Changing the rule will immediately overwrite the previous one.
settings.maximum_manual_trip_details: Maximum daily manual trips a user can do. Changing the rule will immediately overwrite the previous one.
settings.maximum_of_transactions_user: Maximum of transactions user per period
settings.maximum_of_transactions_user_details: Maximum of transactions user can do for shopping in certain period. Changing the rule will immediately overwrite the previous one.
settings.maximum_number_of_transaction_per_produc: Maximum number of transaction per product per user
settings.number_of_days_before_orders_expire: Number of days before transactions/orders expire
settings.number_of_days_before_orders_expire_deta: Valid for all orders and transactions of every products
settings.maximum_number_of_transaction_per_produc: Valid for all products. Maximum number of transaction an user can make on the same product. Changing the rule will immediately overwrite the previous one.
settings.maximum_number_of_points_per_session: Maximum number of points per session
settings.maximum_number_of_points_per_session_det: The maximum number of points an user can earn for each transport mode. Changing the rule will immediately overwrite the previous one.
settings.activate_control_points_details: By activating control points, users must enter at least two addresses from their home, place of study, and workplace to earn points or a higher points coefficient.
settings.limit_greenpoints_to_control_points: Limit Greenpoints to users with control points
settings.limit_greenpoints_to_control_points_deta: Only users who travel between control points with earn points. Standard coefficient apply.
settings.control_point_coefficient_details: This coefficient will be multiplied by the standard points coefficient when the user starts and ends a trip at control points. Otherwise, the standard coefficient applies.
settings.admin_email_details: Email where you want to reveive a copy of user reports
settings.activate_order_admin_email: Receive an email for each order
settings.activate_user_report_admin_email: Receive an email for each user report
settings.order_admin_email_details: Email where you want to reveive a copy of user orders.
settings.greenpoints_ceofficient_details: Number of times we multiply the Greenhouse gases Kg to get the Greenpoints
settings.can_edit_label: This new user can edit admin informations

table_descriptions.total_GHG: Kg of greenhouse gases (GHGs) that were not emitted into the atmosphere by the participant through their use of sustainable modes of transport, compared to emissions if they had been in a car. Calculated for the duration of the Challenge without solo car. A car emits an average of 0.21kg of GHGs per km travelled.
table_descriptions.days_activity: Number of days the participant travelled using a sustainable or non-sustainable mode of transportation
table_descriptions.all_activities: Number of km travelled by the participant using each of these modes of transport
table_descriptions.other_activities: Number of kilometres travelled by the participant using modes of transport other than those listed above

policies.load_users_excel1: 1. Limited Use of Data: You agree to use user data provided by Greenplay only for the specific purposes of the ongoing challenge, such as evaluating participants' performance and distributing rewards. No secondary or different use of the data will be made without the explicit consent of the users.
policies.load_users_excel2: 2. Data Protection: You agree to implement appropriate security measures to protect users' personal data from unauthorized access, misuse, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
policies.load_users_excel3: 3. Non-Disclosure: You will not disclose users' data to third parties, except when strictly necessary for the completion of the challenge and with the consent of the concerned participants.
policies.load_users_excel4: 4. Data Destruction: At the end of the challenge or as soon as the data is no longer needed for the purposes for which it was collected, you agree to securely destroy all copies of users' data. If a user requests that their data be destroyed and explicitly asks for it in writing, you must comply with this request within 90 days.
policies.load_users_excel5: 5. Compliance with Applicable Laws: You agree to comply with all applicable data protection and privacy laws, including the articles mentioned in Law 25: https://www.legisquebec.gouv.qc.ca/en/document/lc/p-39.1.
